label: A4B2C2DE_oP40_62_2cd_2c_d_c_c-001
title: K$_{2}$SnCl$_{4}\cdot$H$_{2}$O Structure
comments: Various structures have been proposed for K$_{2}$SnCl$_{4}\cdot$H$_{2}$O: \begin{itemize} \item The original determination of this structure was made by (Brasseur, 1939) and given the \href{current_web_home_dir/A4BC2D_oP32_62_2cd_a_2c_b-001}{{\em Strukturbericht} label $E3_{5}$ by (Herrmann, 1943)}. \item (Kamenar, 1962) proposed an \href{current_web_home_dir/A4BC2D_oP32_62_2cd_c_d_c-001}{alternative structure}.  Neither of these experiments located the hydrogen atoms. \item This was finally accomplished by (Ye, 2013), shown here.  Their structure refined that of (Kamenar, 1962). \end{itemize}
